p: Table 3 presents the PK parameters after treatment, by dose level. Similar to other large molecules, the distribution volume of E7777 was small, and nearly equal to the plasma volume at 3000 mL/70 kg (43 mL/kg). The total clearance rate, however, was much lower than the hepatic blood flow rate at 1450 mL/min/70 kg (21 mL/min/kg). 20 In other words, the PK characteristics of E7777 indicate a small distribution volume and low clearance.
